mapper.select: select mpr.* from PUBLIC.mmb_point_record mpr where mpr.deleted = '0' and mpr.score_source = #{scoreSource}
select sum(point) from PUBLIC.mmb_point_record where deleted = '0' and point > 0 and member_id = #{memberId} and extract(year from point_time) = extract(year from #{pointTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

select mpr.* from PUBLIC.mmb_point_record mpr where mpr.deleted = '0' and mpr.point_surplus > 0 and mpr.member_id = #{memberId} and to_char(mpr.point_time , 'yyyyMM') > to_char(now() - interval '24 month' , 'yyyyMM') order by mpr.point_time, mpr.record_no

select mpr.member_id, sum(mpr.point_surplus) point_surplus from PUBLIC.mmb_point_record mpr where mpr.deleted = '0' and mpr.point_surplus > '0' and date_part('year', mpr.point_time) = (date_part('year', now()) - 1) GROUP by mpr.member_id

select p.member_id member_id,m.telephone telephone, sum(p.point_surplus) point_surplus from mmb_point_record p inner join mmb_master m on m.member_id = p.member_id and m.deleted = '0' and (m.telephone is not null or trim(m.telephone) != '') where p.deleted = '0' and p.point_surplus > 0 and date_part('year', mmb_point_record.point_time) = (date_part('year', now()) - 1) -- and to_char(p.point_time , 'yyyyMM') <= to_char(now() - interval '25 month' , 'yyyyMM') GROUP by p.member_id,telephone
mapper.update: update public.mmb_point_record set point_surplus = 0, update_time = now() where deleted = '0' and point_surplus >'0' and date_part('year', point_time) = (date_part('year', now()) - 1)
mapper.select: select record_no,point_surplus from mmb_point_record where deleted = '0' and type = '10' and point_surplus > 0 and insert_user_id = 'ERP' and member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by point_time,record_no

select r.record_no record_no,m.telephone member_code,r.point point,r.point_time point_time,r.type from mmb_point_record r,mmb_master m where r.member_id = m.member_id and m.deleted = '0' and r.deleted = '0' and r.erp_send_status = '20'

select r.record_no record_no,m.telephone member_code,r.point point,r.point_time point_time from mmb_point_record r,mmb_master m where r.member_id = m.member_id and m.deleted = '0' and r.deleted = '0' and r.erp_send_status = '20' and r.record_no = #{recordNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select r.record_no record_no,m.telephone member_code,r.point point,r.point_time point_time,r.erp_send_status, r.type from mmb_point_record r,mmb_master m where r.member_id = m.member_id and m.deleted = '0' and r.deleted = '0' and r.record_no = #{recordNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select mpr.* from PUBLIC.mmb_point_record mpr where mpr.deleted = '0' and mpr.point_surplus = 0 and (mpr.type = '11' or mpr.type = '91' or mpr.type = '21') and (mpr.point_time < (current_date - 15) and mpr.insert_user_id = 'ERP') union select mpr.* from PUBLIC.mmb_point_record mpr left join ord_master ord on mpr.score_source = ord.order_id where mpr.deleted = '0' and mpr.point_surplus = 0 and (mpr.type = '11' or mpr.type = '91' or mpr.type = '21') and (mpr.point_time < (current_date - 15) and mpr.insert_user_id != 'ERP') --and ord.trade_status = '20'
mapper.update: update mmb_point_record set point = 0, point_cash = 0, point_surplus = 0, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = now() where deleted = '0' and point > 0 and score_source = #{scoreSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
